item.title: Report I-2024120051
item.description:
Report I-2024120051

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-26T21:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-13
  • City: Jamaica
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 12/13/2024 hidden dangerous goods were discovered during the shipment inspection process at the DHL Express JFK Gateway located at the JFK International Airport, Cargo Building 263, Jamaica NY 11430. Transportation by road has been confirmed. Shipment also contains UN1133 Adhesives Class 3 Single Package or Inner Packaging(if any): Packaging Type: Bottle Material of Construction: Glass Package Capacity: 10 mi Amount in Package: 10 ml Number in Shipment: 11 Number Failed: 11
